Html:
I have been using Chirpy, even before you brought it over to codeplex, but I have recently noticed something strange.

I have aspx and ascx files that have javascript embedded in, so I decided to utilize *.chirpy.aspx (ascx) to minimize the code,

but noticed when I look at the controller generated code it points to the *.chirpy.* view, specifically under *controller.generated.cs code under the

public class ViewNames.

sinnerFA
